reviewtext: I am very pleased with the lens.I found that sometimes I would like even a more powerful zoom but all in all it has been great - I can get much "closer" shots.I do not have other lenses to compare to except a Signm Iabout the same range0 which I was given but which does have auto zoom which does not work with my camera so it has to be manual -- so was not being used, and still is not.I was pleased to see the fantastic price that I got this Canon lens for.
summary: I really like it a lot
